switches.title: Switches
switches.description: Here you setup how many switches you want. Each switch can take either a trackUri or a an array for TTS.

items.title: Device setup
items.description: Use this to setup different switches, which will send a audio file to sonos

isNotification.title: notification
isNotification.description: Notifications allows Sonos to continue playing what was playing before. Volume will also return to pre-toggle volume. Not recommended if multiple speakers are in use.

trackUri.title: Track uri
trackUri.description: Location of the audio file to be played. The location should be available for Sonos

sonosSpeakerNames.title: Sonos speaker names
sonosSpeakerNames.description: Use this to control which sonos speakers should be played when the switch activates

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: Volume to play the song at

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: Delay between the On event is sent, and the audio is played. Only used when 'isNotification' is toggled on

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: When should Sonos return to the track playing before in seconds. Add two seconds to you audio for best results. Only used when 'isNotification' is toggled on
